Interface Device

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsDevice, Headphones, Laptop, Printer, Tablet, Tv
public interface Device
This interface is used to define the methods that are used in any device
Author:
- Cemal BOLAT

    • exportFilePrint

      void exportFilePrint​(int index, FileWriter fileWriter) throws IOException
      This method is used to print the device information for the export format
      Parameters:
      index - - index of the device
      fileWriter - - fileWriter to write to the file
      Throws:
      IOException - - if the fileWriter is not valid
